document.full_text: police on long island resumed on tuesday a search for clues in the hunt for a possible serial killer but their sweep of 11 hot spots in fbi aerial photographs came up dry.
document.title: long island serial killer search comes up dry
lines_and_colors: police on long island resumed on tuesday a search for clues in the hunt for a possible serial killer but their sweep of 11 hot spots in fbi aerial photographs came up dry.
